original_text: Now upon the first day of the week, very early in the morning, they came unto the sepulchre, bringing the spices which they had prepared, and certain others with them.
korean_text: 안식 후 첫날 새벽에 이 여자들이 그 준비한 향품을 가지고 무덤에 가서

sentences.original_text: Now upon the first day of the week
bringing the spices which they had prepared

sentences.korean_translation: 그리고 그들과 함께 몇몇 다른 사람들도 있었더라
